name: Henchman Story
description: Embark on an epic journey in a post-apocalyptic world where you play as a skilled henchman working for a dangerous criminal organization.

name: Dying Light 2 Stay Human
description: A sequel to the acclaimed open-world survival game where you must navigate a city overrun by zombies and other dangers. Explore, fight, and survive!

name: Cyberpunk 2077
description: Explore the neon-lit streets of Night City in this open-world RPG where your choices shape the outcome of your story.

name: The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt
description: Join Geralt of Rivia in his quest to track down his adopted daughter, facing monsters and dark forces along the way.

name: Minecraft
description: A sandbox game where you can build, mine, and explore in an infinite world. Play alone or with friends and craft your dream world.

name: Assassin's Creed Valhalla
description: Join Eivor as they lead their Viking clan to settle in England, facing enemies and making alliances in this open-world RPG.

name: Far Cry 5
description: In Far Cry 5, you play as a sheriff who must battle a doomsday cult in a rural Montana town in this open-world first-person shooter.

name: Red Dead Redemption 2
description: Set in the Wild West, Red Dead Redemption 2 follows Arthur Morgan and the Van der Linde gang as they try to survive and thrive in a dying world.

name: Call of Duty: Warzone
description: A free-to-play battle royale game where you fight to be the last person standing in a large open-world map with up to 150 players.

name: Overwatch
description: A team-based multiplayer first-person shooter where players take on the role of heroes with unique abilities to fight in fast-paced team battles.

name: FIFA 23
description: Experience the ultimate soccer simulation game with updated teams, players, and realistic gameplay mechanics.

name: The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim Special Edition
description: Explore the vast open world of Skyrim and become the Dragonborn, battling dragons and completing quests.

name: Resident Evil Village
description: Join Ethan Winters as he explores a dark and mysterious village, battling horrific creatures and uncovering dark secrets.

name: Watch Dogs: Legion
description: Fight for freedom in a dystopian future where you can recruit anyone to your cause, each with their unique abilities.

name: Borderlands 3
description: Dive into the chaotic world of Borderlands with a new cast of colorful characters and more explosive combat.

name: Dragon Age: Inquisition
description: Lead a team of heroes and battle against dark forces in the fantasy world of Thedas.

name: Halo: The Master Chief Collection
description: Experience the iconic Halo saga with remastered versions of the original games in this legendary collection.

name: Hunt: Showdown
description: A multiplayer Survival game set in the dark swamps where players hunt down monsters while avoiding other hunters.

name: Mordhau
description: An online multiplayer medieval combat game where players engage in brutal and strategic battles using swords, axes, and other weapons.

name: Star Wars Jedi: Fallen Order
description: Experience the Star Wars universe in this action-adventure game where you play as a young Jedi struggling to survive after Order 66.
